questions.question: Did we isolate? If so for how long and where did we isolate to? Please record the time isolation started and when we stopped isolating.
questions.answer: We were not informed in time to isolate. We were notified at approximately 30 minutes.

questions.question: Where were the samples pulled from?
What were the results of the samples?
Was there any noticeable impact on the Waste Treatment Plant?
questions.answer: As of 2200, no impact has been noticed.
